name: Space Runner (Makto Maktavish)
description:
Space Runner is a game developed by Makto Maktavish for "My First Game Jam"

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR WINDWOS DOWNLOADS: For some reason, Windows defender sees the game as Trojan virus which it is not. I don't know how to fix that. I did some research and apparently many executable files made with pyinstaller (that's what I used) are considered as virus by Windows. So I would like to say that there is no risk downloading my game, however, if you feel there might be any risk, I won't mind if you don't download!
